S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-1241: When booting a database under security manager, boot may fail with message java.sql.SQLException: Java exception: 'access denied (java.io.FilePermission for logmirror.ctrl if database was not shutdown cleanly after previous access. Fix uses existing privExists method to access the file, avoiding the SecurityException.
Committed for Myrna Van Lunteren <m.v.lunteren@gmail.com>
